name: European Corporate Governance Institute
goal: The ECGI is an international scientific non-profit association. Our primary role is to undertake, commission and disseminate research on corporate governance. Based upon impartial and objective research and the collective knowledge and wisdom of our members, we can advise on the formulation of corporate governance policy and development of best practice and undertake any other activity that will improve understanding and exercise of corporate governance.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, External Relations, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Corporate Governance and Stewardship, in particular Sustainable Finance, Common Ownership, Technology, Bank Regulation and Capital Market Union
